data.value: The version number of this product

data.name: Activated.Help
data.value: The activation status of this product

data.name: RunMode.Help
data.value: There is no feature limitation when work in licensed mode, trial mode or localhost mode, you will be required to activate it when trial expires.

data.name: ConfirmReactivation.Text
data.value: Flex Events is already activated, are you sure you wish to reactivate it?

data.name: EnterSerialNo.Text
data.value:
You will receive by email a serial number to activate this product after buying it on DNN Store or other market places, visit below URL to re-send it if not arrived:

http://www.bizmodules.net/DesktopModules/BizModules - IONConnecter/Resend.aspx?sku=[SKU]&email=Your Email Address

You can manually activate this product if your server is behind a firewall.

data.name: SerialNo.Help
data.value: The serial number of this product, the serial was sent to your email box after buying it on DNN Store or other market places. if the serial number does not arrive, contact us by email with reference to your invoice ID.
